name: DANCING SLOWLY // FURNITURE SONGS
description:
## SOUND ON ##

Fourth song of the album "Furniture Songs", composed by Gabriel Politzer; sound artist, musician and biologist from Rio de Janeiro.

The composition originates on a trip to Bueno Brandão - south of Minas Gerais,  Brazil - in the apocalyptic and chaotic context of the pandemic. Inspired by the music Gymnopedies by Erik Satie, Dancing Slowly follows the path of a relaxing melody and a slow tempo.
 
The process of creation and production was minimalist done, only with a laptop, a headset and a lot of research on musical theory. Inspired by the DIY culture, "Furniture Songs" shows that virtually anyone can create their sounds without the need for expensive and specific equipment and hard work.

Track: 4 of 6
Genres: Chill-Out, Ambient, Lo-Fi
Master: Rodrigo Paschoal
Release Date: Apr 30, 2021
